# Maintainers Guide

This project uses [MKdocs](https://www.mkdocs.org/) to render the project.

## Python

```zsh
brew install pyenv

pyenv install -l

pyenv install 3.10.8

pyenv local 3.10.8

python -m venv env_3.10.8

source env_3.10.8/bin/activate
```

```zsh
pip install -r requirments.txt

./scripts/serve.sh
```

## deploy

https://dash.cloudflare.com
